pages.text: Sulfuric acid is necesary for $(l:ore_processing/quintupling)Ore Quintupling$(/l).  It is used in the $(l:block/chemical_dissolution_chamber)Chemical Dissolution Chamber$(/l) to dissolve ores into slurry.
It is created by combining $(l:chemicals/sulfur_trioxide)Sulfur Trioxide$(/l) and $(l:chemicals/water_vapor)Water Vapor$(/l) in the $(l:block/chemical_infuser)Chemical Infuser$(/l).
